body.section: Hierarchy OtherTreatment is a kind of CancerTreatment

section.title: Description
section.p: Other treatment that cannot be defined as surgery, radiation, or systemic therapy.

stentry.p: Identifies other treatment that cannot be defined as surgery, radiation, or systemic therapy according to the defined data elements in the FORDS manual. Possible values are None; Other; 'Other - Experimental; Other - Double Blind; Other - Unproven; Refusal; Recommended, unknown if administered; Unkown; etc.
